name: Heart Rush
description:
A little game made by @Darkspine77 and @Ayaka (me!)

Credits:

Music (Title screen & during game) by Purple Planet

Game Over SFX by LittleRobotSoundFactory

Development challenges were not few. It's valentines, yet this game's breaking our hearts :( but--no joke, it did break my heart when hours spent debugging it for the WebGL build to work actually ended up with the thing not working at all......

Debugging nightmares aside (which's 99% because of my ugly codes and stupid mistake), it was a fun game to develop! Pushing the last git commit and closing Unity, I shouted, "Next game will surely be better!" (no, ofc I didn't shout. It's 2.30AM here)

I hope you have as much fun playing this as we did making this!

- Ayaka // atsuzaki.tumblr.com
